references.paper_title: A non-negative factorization approach to node pooling in graph convolutional neural networks.
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the node pooling techniques used in Cluster-GT, providing a crucial base for hierarchical graph learning methods.

references.paper_title: Spectral clustering with graph neural networks for graph pooling.
references.reason: This paper details spectral clustering methods integrated into graph neural networks, providing another essential foundation for the cluster-wise approach of Cluster-GT.
This paper offers a novel perspective on attention mechanisms, employing kernel methods that are integrated into Cluster-GT's N2C-Attn.

references.paper_title: Transformers are rnns: Fast autoregressive transformers with linear attention.
references.reason: This paper introduces linear attention mechanisms, providing critical efficiency improvements that are adopted by Cluster-GT's N2C-Attn.
This paper provides a comprehensive benchmark for graph neural networks, which is used for evaluating the performance of the proposed Cluster-GT architecture.
